languages.text: Души смертных станут щедрым даром истинным богам и их порождениям. Ревущие — хорошая дань силам, что помогают Вольному Торговцу в этом проклятом месте.
Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.
languages.original_text: Души смертных станут щедрым даром истинным богам и их порождениям. Ревущие — хорошая дань силам, что помогают Вольному Торговцу в этом проклятом месте.

languages.text: 凡人的灵魂是献给亚空间真神与真神子嗣的慷慨礼物。那些尖啸者可以成为合适的祭品，让行商浪人获得逃出诅咒之地的力量。
languages.original_text: Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.

traits.locale_text: 凡人的灵魂是献给亚空间真神与真神子嗣的慷慨礼物。那些尖啸者可以成为合适的祭品，让行商浪人获得逃出诅咒之地的力量。

languages.text: Sterbliche Seelen eignen sich bestens als großzügiger Geschenk für die wahren Götter und ihre Abkommen. Die Kreischer könnten als Tribut für die Mächte dienen, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} in dieser verfluchten Welt helfen.
languages.original_text: Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.

traits.locale_text: Sterbliche Seelen eignen sich bestens als großzügiger Geschenk für die wahren Götter und ihre Abkommen. Die Kreischer könnten als Tribut für die Mächte dienen, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} in dieser verfluchten Welt helfen.

languages.text: Les âmes mortelles font des offrandes de choix pour les véritables dieux et leur progéniture. Les Hurleurs pourraient être offerts en sacrifice aux pouvoirs qui ont protégé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans ce lieu maudit.
languages.original_text: Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.

traits.locale_text: Les âmes mortelles font des offrandes de choix pour les véritables dieux et leur progéniture. Les Hurleurs pourraient être offerts en sacrifice aux pouvoirs qui ont protégé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans ce lieu maudit.

languages.text: Las almas mortales son una ofrenda grata para los dioses verdaderos y su progenie. Los Aulladores serían un tributo a los poderes que ayudan a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en este lugar maldito.
languages.original_text: Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.

traits.locale_text: Las almas mortales son una ofrenda grata para los dioses verdaderos y su progenie. Los Aulladores serían un tributo a los poderes que ayudan a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en este lugar maldito.

languages.text: 人間の魂は、真なる神々とその子孫への惜しみない贈り物になる。シュリーカーは、この呪われた場所で自由開拓者を助ける力への貢ぎ物となる都合のいい存在だ。
languages.original_text: Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.

traits.locale_text: 人間の魂は、真なる神々とその子孫への惜しみない贈り物になる。シュリーカーは、この呪われた場所で自由開拓者を助ける力への貢ぎ物となる都合のいい存在だ。

languages.text: Fâni ruhları, gerçek tanrılara ve onların yaratıklarına sunulacak cömert hediyelerdir. Çığırtkanlar, bu uğursuz yerde Hür Tacir'e yardım eden güçlere adak olarak sunulabilir.
languages.original_text: Mortal souls make for generous gifts to the true gods and their spawn. The Shriekers could serve as a tribute to the powers that aid the Rogue Trader in this accursed place.
